entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 10:42 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

Temperature: -2.6°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %

Dewpoint: -3.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023
